og.title: New director tackling substance abuse

twitter.description: CONCORD — As Seacoast communities struggle with a heroin epidemic, the New Hampshire Charitable Foundation has stepped up to fund a position at the governor's office to coordinate resources statewide. Governor Maggie Hassan appointed John “Jack” Wozmak of Walpole as senior director for Substance Misuse and Behavioral Health.
twitter.title: New director tackling substance abuse

article_metadata.description: CONCORD — As Seacoast communities struggle with a heroin epidemic, the New Hampshire Charitable Foundation has stepped up to fund a position at the governor's office to coordinate resources statewide. Governor Maggie Hassan appointed John “Jack” Wozmak of Walpole as senior director for Substance Misuse and Behavioral Health.
